column4: How to do fresh install of  ubuntu 10.10 and remove 10.04? I have dual boot of Win XP and Ubuntu 10.04. I did not use Wubi installer.
When you install ubuntu 10.10, select manual partitioning and install Ubuntu 10.10 on the partition you have 10.04. Make sure you tell it to reformat
It will leave Windows XP untouched as long as you only format the partition with Ubuntu 10.10
when i choose that option it will do the format of partition automatically right ?
